flavor: "I may not be the mightiest Avenger, but I'm definitely the coolest."
name: Hawkeye
text: "Quick Draw" — Action: Exhaust Hawkeye → ready Hawkeye's bow.

name: Clint Barton
text: Weapon of Choice — Action: Spend 1 resource of any type → search your deck and discard pile for Hawkeye's Bow and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase).

name: Hawkeye's Bow
text:
Restricted. 
Your hero gets +1 ATK and each of your [[arrow]] attacks gain ranged.

name: Hawkeye's Quiver
text: You may play [[arrow]] events attached to this card as if they were in your hand. Hero Action: Exhaust Hawkeye's Quiver → search the top 5 cards of your deck for an [[arrow]] event and attach it faceup to this card.

flavor: "Is that all you got?"
name: Mockingbird
text: Interrupt: When the villain initiates an attack against you, spend 1 resource of any type and return Mockingbird to your hand → prevent all damage from this attack.

flavor: EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!
name: Sonic Arrow
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow → confuse an enemy and deal 3 damage to it (5 damage instead if it is already confused)

flavor: "Anyone ever tell you how your eyes sparkle when you're angry?" -- Clint Barton
name: Explosive Arrow
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow and choose a player → deal 3 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player.

flavor: "Hail Hawkeye!" -- Clint Barton
name: Electric Arrow
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow → stun an enemy and deal 3 damage to it (5 damage instead if it is already stunned).

flavor: "It's a great way to get around." -- Clint Barton
name: Cable Arrow
text: Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow → remove 3 threat from a scheme, ignoring any crisis icons in play.

name: Vibranium Arrow
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow → deal 6 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

flavor: "When you fight alongside gods and monsters, it's not enough to be great; you have to the best." -- Clint Barton
name: Expert Marksman
text: Resource: Exhaust Expert Marksman → generate a [wild] resource for an [[arrow]] event.

flavor: "You see I', literally pointing arrows at your, right?."
name: Hawkeye
text: Action: Exhaust this ally and discard 1 card from your hand → deal X damage to an enemy, where X is the number of printed resources on that card.

flavor: "As long as the Black Blade blazes darkly in my hand, I must fight on."
name: Black Knight
text: Black Knight's basic attack gains piercing.

flavor: "Sometimes being a gentleman means holding the door, and the rest of the building."
name: Goliath
text: Action: Goliath gets +4 ATK until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, discard Goliath. (Max once per phase.)

flavor: "Cap isn't the only solider who loves his country."
name: U.S. Agent
text: Retaliate 1.

name: Sky Cycle
text: Attach to an [[Avenger]] ally. Max 1 per ally. Attached ally gains [[Aerial]]. Action: Exhaust Sky Cycle → ready attached ally.

flavor: "We mostly just wait for Cap to yell 'Avengers Aseemble' and attack in the same direction as him" -- Clint Barton
name: Team Training
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
 Each ally you control gets +1 hit point.

flavor: "Try that again. I dare you." -- Jessica Drew
name: Ready for Action
text: Hero Action: Give an ally you control a tough status card.

name: War Machine
text:
Toughness.
 War Machine's basic attack gains ranged.

flavor: "We come together to fight what can't be fought alone." -- Luke Cage
name: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
text: Hero Action: Exhaust an [[avenger]] character you control → ready another [[avenger]] character you control.

name: Criminal Past
text:
Give to the Clint Barton Player.
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
·Exhaust Clint Barton → remove this card from the game.
·Discard Hawkeye's Bow from play. Discard this obligation.
real_text:
Give to the Clint Barton Player.
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
·Exhaust Clint Barton → remove this card from the game.
·Discard Hawkeye's Bow from play. Discard this obligation.

name: Crossfire
text: Quickstrike.
real_text: Quickstrike.
boost_text: Boost: If this boost resolves during an attack, the attack gains piercing.
real_boost_text: Boost: If this boost resolves during an attack, the attack gains piercing.
attack_text: Crossfire's attacks gain piercing.

name: Marked for Death
text: When Revealed: The Clint Barton player searches their hand, deck, discard pile, and play area for Mockingbird and places her faceup beneath this card. When this scheme is defeated, return Mockingbird to her owner's hand.
real_text: When Revealed: The Clint Barton player searches their hand, deck, discard pile, and play area for Mockingbird and places her faceup beneath this card. When this stage is defeated, return Mockingbird to her owner's hand.

name: Crossfire's Rifle
text:
Attach to Crossfire. Otherwise, attach to the villain.
Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend a resource → discard Crossfire's Rifle.
real_text:
Attach to Crossfire. Otherwise, attach to the villain.
Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend a resource → discard Crossfire's Rifle.
attack_text: When attached enemy attacks, the attack gains ranged.

name: Sniper Shot
text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 3 threat on the main scheme.
When Revealed (Hero): Deal 3 damage to your hero.
real_text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 3 threat on the main scheme.
When Revealed (Hero): Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: "I like to let them run a little before taking the shot." -- Crossfire

name: Spider-Woman
text: "Superhuman Agility" — Interrupt: When you play an aspect card, Spider-Woman gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF until the end of the round. (limit once per round for each aspect.)

name: Jessica Drew
text: Double Agent — Choose two aspects instead of one during deck-building. You must include an equal number of cards from those aspects in your deck. Action:: Look at the top card of any deck. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "I gotta hand it to you, kid. This is one of the more impressive messes I've ever seen."
name: Captain Marvel
text: Response: After Captain Marvel uses a basic power, draw 1 card.

name: Finesse
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Finesse → generate a [wild] resource for an aspect card.

name: Jessica Drew's Apartment
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Jessica Drew's Apartment → search the top 5 cards of your deck for an aspect card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Venom Blast
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "Warn me before you use that power again, okay?" -- Peter Parker
name: Pheromones
text: Hero Action: Stun and confuse an enemy.

name: Contaminant Immunity
text: Hero Action: Heal 3 damage from Spider-Woman and give her a tough status card.

flavor: "Now all I gotta do is Spy-der Woman my way inside." -- Jessica Drew
name: Inconspicuous
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove a total of 3 threat from among schemes in play.

flavor: "People always think I can fly. I can't But I do glide really well." -- Jessica Drew
name: Self-Propelled Glide
text: Hero Action: Ready Spider-Woman. She gains [[aerial]] until the end of the round.

flavor: "Alright you bunch of losers. Who wants a piece of me?."
name: Spider-Girl
text: Response: After you play Spider-Girl from your hand, stun and confuse a minion.

flavor: "You are in Wakanda now!" -- T'Challa
name: Press the Advantage
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is stunned or confused, draw 1 card.

name: Piercing Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

flavor: "Seriously, what is it with New York? Would it kill you to invade Denver once?."
name: Spider-Man
text: Response: After you play Spider-Man from your hand, remove 3 [per_hero] threat from a side scheme.

name: Skilled Investigator
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After a side scheme is defeated, exhaust Skilled Investigator → draw 1 card.

flavor: "Don't be scared, honey. Just think about how jealous the other kids will be when you tell them how Iron Man resuced you." -- Tony Stark
name: Clear the Area
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat on that scheme, draw 1 card.

name: Uncertain Loyalties
text:
Give tot he Jessica Drew Player.
·Exhaust Jessica Drew → remove Uncertain Loyalties from the game.
·Place 3 threat on the main scheme. Discard this obligation.
real_text:
Give tot he Jessica Drew Player.
·Exhaust Jessica Drew → remove Uncertain Loyalties from the game.
·Place 3 threat on the main scheme. Discard this obligation.

name: The Viper
text:
While the Viper is engaged with you, your hand size is reduced by 1.
(Spider-Woman's nemesis minion.)
real_text:
While the Viper is engaged with you, your hand size is reduced by 1.
(Spider-Woman's nemesis minion.)
flavor: "It's time for you to come home, Jessica."
illustrator: Frank D. Armata, David Finch, & Danny Mikki

name: The Viper's Ambition
text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1[per_hero] threat here.
real_text: When Revealed: Place an additional 1[per_hero] threat here.
flavor: The Viper has given everything to Hydra in return for the promise of power.

name: Hydra Regular
text: Incite 1. (When this card is revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.)
real_text: Incite 1. (When this card is revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.)
flavor: "When you consider what kind of person would join a terrorist organization bent on world domination, it's easy to see why Hydra's troops don't impress." -- Jessica Drew

name: Hail Hydra!
text: When Revealed: Each Hydra minion engaged with a hero attacks that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Hydra minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.
real_text: When Revealed: Each Hydra minion engaged with a hero attacks that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Hydra minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Crossbones
attack_text: While Crossbones has a Weapon attachment, his attacks gain piercing. (Discard any tough status cards from the target before dealing damage.)
flavor: "I consider myself a craftsman. I specialize in destruction and terror."

name: Crossbones
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Crossbone's Machine Gun and attach it to Crossbones. Shuffle the encounter deck.
real_text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Crossbone's Machine Gun and attach it to Crossbones. Shuffle the encounter deck.
attack_text: While Crossbones has a Weapon attachment, his attacks gain piercing.

name: Crossbones
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.
real_text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.
attack_text: While Crossbones has a Weapon attachment, his attacks gain piercing.
flavor: "Those super-powered types might have more strength, but none of them have my style."

name: Attack on Mount Athena
flavor: Crossbones is leading an army of Hydra soldiers in a direct assault on the Project P.E.G.A.S.U.S. facility in the Adirondack Mountains.
back_text:
Contents: Crossbones (I) and Crossbones (II). Crossbones, Experimental Weapons, and Standard Encounter sets. Three modular sets (Hydra Assault, Weapon Master, and Legions of Hydra).
Setup: Create the Experimental Weapons deck and set it next to the main scheme deck. (see rulebook page 5.)

name: The Infinity Stone
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.
real_text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.
back_flavor: Inside the Project P.E.G.A.S.U.S. facility, S.H.I.E.L.D. agents fight desperatly to prevent Hydra from obtaining the Reality Stone stored within.

name: The Getaway
text:
When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
real_text:
When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
back_flavor: Hydra has seized the Infinity Stone, and Crossbones orders their withdrawal. You must stop them before they escape!

name: Crossbones' Machine Gun
text: Attach to Crossbones. Uses (2[per_hero] ammo counters).
real_text: Attach to Crossbones. Uses (2[per_hero] ammo counters).
attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Crossbones attacks you, remove 1 ammo counter from this card and discard the top card of the encounter deck → take indirect damage equal to the number of boost icons on the discarded card.

name: Crossbones' Armor
text:
Attach to Crossbones.
Forced Interrupt: When Crossbones would take any amount of damage, place it here instead. If there is 5 or more damage here, discard Crossbones' Armor.
real_text:
Attach to Crossbones.
Forced Interrupt: When Crossbones would take any amount of damage, place it here instead. If there is 5 or more damage here, discard Crossbones' Armor.

name: Hydra Bomber
text: When Revealed: Choose to either take 2 damage or place 1 threat on the main scheme.
real_text: When Revealed: Choose to either take 2 damage or place 1 threat on the main scheme.
flavor: "I know that if you cut off one head, two more will take its place. But what if it blows up instead?" -- She-Hulk

name: Full Auto
text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Surge.
When Revealed (Hero): Discard X cards from the top of the encounter deck, where X is Crossbones' ATK. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon discarded this way.
real_text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Surge.
When Revealed (Hero): Discard X cards from the top of the encounter deck, where X is Crossbones' ATK. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon discarded this way.

name: Hard as Nails
text: When Revealed: Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead.
real_text: When Revealed: Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead.
boost_text: Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead.
real_boost_text: Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead.

Incite 1. (When this card is revealed place 1 threat on the main scheme.)

real_text:
Incite 1. (When this card is revealed place 1 threat on the main scheme.)

name: Crossbones' Assault
text: When Defeated: Crossbones activates against the player who defeated this scheme.
real_text: When Defeated: Crossbones activates against the player who defeated this scheme.
flavor: Crossbones is a heartless killer, but he's not a psychopath. His assault on P.E.G.A.S.U.S. is ruthless and efficient.

name: Cornered Staff
text: When Revealed: Discard 1[per_hero] cards from the top of the encounter deck. Place 1 additional threat here for each boost icon discarded this way.
real_text: When Revealed: Discard 1[per_hero] cards from the top of the encounter deck. Place 1 additional threat here for each boost icon discarded this way.
flavor: Hydra is rounding up P.E.G.A.S.U.S. staff to hold as hostages.

name: Laser Rifle
text:
Attach to the Villain.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][physical] resources → discard this card.
real_text:
Attach to the Villain.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Energy Shield
text:
Attach to the villain.
Attached villain gains retaliate 1.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental] resources → discard this card.
real_text:
Attach to the villain.
Attached villain gains retaliate 1.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental] resources → discard this card.
flavor: "You're never going to convince Cap that an energy shield is as good as his old frisbee." -- Carol Danvers

name: Power Gauntlets
text:
Attach to the Villain.
Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.
real_text:
Attach to the Villain.
Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.
attack_text: Forced Response: After the attached villain attacks and damages you, discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Exo-Suit
text:
Attach to the villain.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resources → discard this card.
real_text:
Attach to the villain.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resources → discard this card.
flavor: "I never should have shared my tech with S.H.I.E.L.D." -- Tony Stark

name: Absorbing Man
text: Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.
real_text: Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.
flavor: "You know I beat Thor once? Picture that: Crusher Creel standing over the God of Thunder, and you think you scare me?"

name: Absorbing Man
text:
Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.
When Revealed: If Super Absorbing Power is in play, deal 1 encounter card to each player. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Super Absorbing Power and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck if it was searched this way.
real_text:
Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.
When Revealed: If Super Absorbing Power is in play, deal 1 encounter card to each player. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Super Absorbing Power and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck if it was searched this way.

name: Absorbing Man
text: Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.
real_text: Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.
scheme_text:
Forced Response: After Absorbing Man activates against you, if he has the:
·Ice or Stone trait, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
·Metal or Wood trait, take 1 indirect damage.
attack_text:
Forced Response: After Absorbing Man activates against you, if he has the:
·Ice or Stone trait, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
·Metal or Wood trait, take 1 indirect damage.

name: None Shall Pass
text:
[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 delay counter here.
Forced Interrupt: When an environment enters play, discard each other environment card in play.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
real_text:
[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 delay counter here.
Forced Interrupt: When an environment enters play, discard each other environment card in play.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
back_text:
Contents: Absorbing Man (I) and Absorbing Man (II). Absorbing Man and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Hydra Patrol).
Setup: Discard cards from the encounter deck until an environment is discarded. Put that card into play and shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

Surge.

real_text:
Surge.

name: Stall Tactics
text: When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme for every 2 delay counters on the main scheme. If no threat was placed this way, this card gains surge.
real_text: When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme for every 2 delay counters on the main scheme. If no threat was placed this way, this card gains surge.
boost_text: If there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme, take 1 indirect damage.
real_boost_text: If there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme, take 1 indirect damage.

name: Swinging Stone
text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Absorbing Man schemes. If Absorbing Man has the Stone trait, he gets +1 SCH for this activation.
When Revealed (Hero): Absorbing Man attacks you. If Absorbing Man has the Stone trait, he gets +1 ATK for this activation.
real_text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Absorbing Man schemes. If Absorbing Man has the Stone trait, he gets +1 SCH for this activation.
When Revealed (Hero): Absorbing Man attacks you. If Absorbing Man has the Stone trait, he gets +1 ATK for this activation.

name: Steel Kick
text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 2 threat on the main scheme (3 threat instead if Absorbing Man has the Metal trait.)
When Revealed (Hero): Take 3 indirect damage (4 indirect damage instead if Absorbing Man has the Metal trait.)
real_text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 2 threat on the main scheme (3 threat instead if Absorbing Man has the Metal trait.)
When Revealed (Hero): Take 3 indirect damage (4 indirect damage instead if Absorbing Man has the Metal trait.)

name: Piercing Thorns
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from your hand. If Absorbing Man has the Wood trait, discard 1 card you control.
real_text: When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from your hand. If Absorbing Man has the Wood trait, discard 1 card you control.
boost_text: If Absorbing Man has the Stone or Wood trait, you are stunned.
real_boost_text: If Absorbing Man has the Stone or Wood trait, you are stunned.

name: Omni-Morph Duplication
text:
When Revealed: If Absorbing Man has the:
·Ice trait, exhaust your identity.
·Metal trait, give Absorbing Man a tough status card and heal 1 damage from him.
·Stone trait, give Absorbing Man 1 facedown boost card. ·Wood trait, discard 1 card at random from your hand.
real_text:
When Revealed: If Absorbing Man has the:
·Ice trait, exhaust your identity.
·Metal trait, give Absorbing Man a tough status card and heal 1 damage from him.
·Stone trait, give Absorbing Man 1 facedown boost card. ·Wood trait, discard 1 card at random from your hand.

name: Icy Grip
text: When Revealed: You are stunned. If Absorbing Man has the Ice trait, take 2 indirect damage.
real_text: When Revealed: You are stunned. If Absorbing Man has the Ice trait, take 2 indirect damage.
boost_text: If Absorbing Man has the Ice or Metal trait, give him a tough status card.
real_boost_text: If Absorbing Man has the Ice or Metal trait, give him a tough status card.

name: Avalanche!

real_text: When Revealed: Each Player must choose to either spend a [energy] resource or take 2 indirect damage (3 indirect damage instead if there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme.)

name: Super Absorbing Power
text: Absorbing Man gains the Ice, Metal, Stone, and Wood traits.
real_text: Absorbing Man gains the Ice, Metal, Stone, and Wood traits.
boost_text: Reveal this card.
real_boost_text: Reveal this card.
flavor: Creel has the ability to absorb the properties of multiple elements at once, but it requires intense concentration.

name: Taskmaster
text: Forced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.
real_text: Forced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.
flavor: "There's nothing you can do that I can't do better."

name: Taskmaster
text:
When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
Forced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.
real_text:
When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
Forced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.

name: Taskmaster
text:
When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.

real_text:
When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
Forced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.

name: Hunting Down Heroes
text:
[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player in hero form must choose to either place 1 threat here or take 1 damage.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
real_text:
[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player in hero form must choose to either place 1 threat here or take 1 damage.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
flavor: The notorious Taskmaster has been appointed by Hydra'c chief of police. His top priority is hunting down the outlaw heroes.
back_text:
Contents: Taskmaster (I) and Taskmaster (II). Taskmaster, Hydra Patrol, and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Weapon Master).
Setup: Set each Captive ally aside out of play. Search the encounter deck for Hydra Patrol and put it into play. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Moon Knight
text: Response: After you play Moon Knight from your hand, spend a [wild] resource → draw 2 cards.
real_text: Response: After you play Moon Knight from your hand, spend a [wild] resource → draw 2 cards.
flavor: "Hydra took over so fast, I wasn't sure they were real."

name: Shang-Chi
text: Response: After you play Shang-Chi from your hand, spend a [energy] resource → stun an enemy.
real_text: Response: After you play Shang-Chi from your hand, spend a [energy] resource → stun an enemy.

name: White Tiger
text: Response: After you play White Tiger from your hand, spend [mental] resource → remove 3 threat from a scheme.
real_text: Response: After you play White Tiger from your hand, spend [mental] resource → remove 3 threat from a scheme.

name: Elektra
text: Response: After you play Elektra from your hand, spend a [physical] resource → deal 3 damage to an enemy.
real_text: Response: After you play Elektra from your hand, spend a [physical] resource → deal 3 damage to an enemy.
flavor: "I got caught when I tried to help some civilians escape a Hydra Patrol. Turns out the civilians were Hydra agents running a sting operation."

name: Hydra Hunter
boost_text: If you are in hero form, take 1 damage. Otherwise place 1 threat on the main scheme.
real_boost_text: If you are in hero form, take 1 damage. Otherwise place 1 threat on the main scheme.
attack_text: Hydra's Hunter's attacks gain piercing and ranged.

name: Taskmaster's Sword
text:
Attach to Taskmaster.

real_text:
Attach to Taskmaster.
Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Taskmaster's Shield
text:
Attach to Taskmaster.
Taskmaster gains retaliate 1.
Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.
real_text:
Attach to Taskmaster.
Taskmaster gains retaliate 1.
Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card.
flavor: "I learned this move from Captain America." -- Taskmaster

name: Photographic Reflexes
text:
Attach to Taskmaster.
Forced Interrupt: when a player attacks Taskmaster, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Taskmaster and deal an equal amount of damage to that player's identity instead. Then, discard Photographic Reflexes. (Max once per attack.)
real_text:
Attach to Taskmaster.
Forced Interrupt: when a player attacks Taskmaster, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Taskmaster and deal an equal amount of damage to that player's identity instead. Then, discard Photographic Reflexes. (Max once per attack.)

name: Mimicry
text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If a Thwart card was discarded this way, Taskmaster schemes.
When Revealed (Hero): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If an Attack card was discarded this way, Taskmaster attacks you.
real_text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If a Thwart card was discarded this way, Taskmaster schemes.
When Revealed (Hero): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If an Attack card was discarded this way, Taskmaster attacks you.

name: Hunted by Hydra
text:
Incite 1. (When this card is revealed place 1 threat on the main scheme.)
When Revealed: Each player in hero form takes 1 damage and discards 1 card at random from their hand.
real_text:
Incite 1. (When this card is revealed place 1 threat on the main scheme.)
When Revealed: Each player in hero form takes 1 damage and discards 1 card at random from their hand.
flavor: "It's a bad time to be a hero." -- Bucky Barnes
illustrator: Alan Davis, Mark Farmer, & Javier Rodriguez

name: Captured by Hydra
text: When Revealed: Place 1 random set-aside Captive ally facedown beneath this scheme. When this scheme is defeated, the player who defeated it takes that ally into their hand and removes this scheme from the game.
real_text: When Revealed: Place 1 random set-aside Captive ally facedown beneath this scheme. When this scheme is defeated, the player who defeated it takes that ally into their hand and removes this scheme from the game.

name: Taskmaster's Training Camp
text: Forced Response: After a minion enters play, give it a tough status card.
real_text: Forced Response: After a minion enters play, give it a tough status card.
flavor: Taskmaster only accepts the best troops into his police force. before a Hydra soldier can enlist, they must survive his training camp.

name: Zola
text: Retaliate 1.
real_text: Retaliate 1.
flavor: "My mutate program will transform these pathetic creatures into Hydra's elite shock-troops!"

name: Zola
text:
Retaliate 1.
When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Test Subjects side scheme and reveal it.
(Shuffle the encounter deck.)
real_text:
Retaliate 1.
When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Test Subjects side scheme and reveal it.
(Shuffle the encounter deck.)

name: Zola
text:
Retaliate 1.
When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and reveals it. (Shuffle the encounter deck.)
real_text:
Retaliate 1.
When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and reveals it. (Shuffle the encounter deck.)

name: The Island of Dr. Zola
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 test counter here. Then, if there are 3 or more test counters here, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player and remove 3 test counters from this scheme.
real_text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 test counter here. Then, if there are 3 or more test counters here, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player and remove 3 test counters from this scheme.
back_text:
Contents: Zola (I) and Zola (II). Zola and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Under Attack)
Setup: Search the encounter deck for Hydra Prison and reveal it. Each player searches the encounter deck for a copy of Ultimate Bio-Servant and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: The Mad Doctor
text:
[star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, place 1 test counter here. Then, if there are 3 or more test counters here, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player and remove 3 test counters from this scheme.
If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.
real_text:
[star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, place 1 test counter here. Then, if there are 3 or more test counters here, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player and remove 3 test counters from this scheme.
If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.
back_text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and reveals it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
back_flavor: Zola's mutates attack you with blind obedience and savage fury. IT's up to you to put an end to this nightmare before the mad doctor unleashes them upon the world!

name: Ultimate Bio-Servant
text: Toughness.
real_text: Toughness.
boost_text: Give the villain a tough status card.
real_boost_text: Give the villain a tough status card.
attack_text: Ultimate Bio-Servant gets +1 ATK for each attachment on it.

name: Zola's Mutate
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Tech attachment is discarded. Attach that card to Zola's Mutate.
real_text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Tech attachment is discarded. Attach that card to Zola's Mutate.
boost_text: Shuffle Zola's Mutate into the encounter deck.
real_boost_text: Shuffle Zola's Mutate into the encounter deck.

name: Berserk Mutate
text: Quickstrike.
real_text: Quickstrike.
boost_text: Place 1 test counter on the main scheme. For each test counter on the main scheme, Zola gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for this activation.
real_boost_text: Place 1 test counter on the main scheme. For each test counter on the main scheme, Zola gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for this activation.

name: Defensive Programming
text:
Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Defensive Programming attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains guard.
real_text:
Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Defensive Programming attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains guard.

name: Pain Inhibitors
text:
Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Pain Inhibitors attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.

real_text:
Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Pain Inhibitors attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains retaliate 1.

name: Neurological Implants

Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Neurological Implants attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.

real_text:
Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Neurological Implants attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points.
illustrator: Frank D. Armata, Steve Epting, & Rick Magyar

name: Mind Ray
text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Zola schemes. You are confused.
When Revealed (Hero): Zola attacks you. You are stunned.
real_text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Zola schemes. You are confused.
When Revealed (Hero): Zola attacks you. You are stunned.
flavor: "You thought Zola defenseless? You arrogant fool!" -- Arnim Zola

name: Technological Enhancements
text:
Incite 1.
When Revealed: Place 1 test counter on the main scheme.
real_text:
Incite 1.
When Revealed: Place 1 test counter on the main scheme.
boost_text: Place 1 test counter on the main scheme.
real_boost_text: Place 1 test counter on the main scheme.

name: Hydra Prison
text:
When Revealed: Each player searches their deck, discard pile and hand for a hero-specific ally and places it facedown beneath this scheme. Place X threat on this scheme where X is the total cost of all allies beneath it. Each player shuffles their deck.
When Defeated: remove this scheme from the game and return each ally beneath it to its owner's hand.
real_text:
When Revealed: Each player searches their deck, discard pile and hand for a hero-specific ally and places it facedown beneath this scheme. Place X threat on this scheme where X is the total cost of all allies beneath it. Each player shuffles their deck.
When Defeated: remove this scheme from the game and return each ally beneath it to its owner's hand.

name: Test Subjects
text: When Defeated: The first player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a minion. Reveal that minion.
real_text: When Defeated: The first player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a minion. Reveal that minion.
flavor: It is a fate rose than death.

name: Zola's Experiments
text: Forced Response: After a minion enters play, attach the topmost Tech attachment in the encounter discard pile to that minion.
real_text: Forced Response: After a minion enters play, attach the topmost Tech attachment in the encounter discard pile to that minion.
flavor: The mad doctor never grows tired of experimenting on his victims.

name: Red Skull
attack_text: Red Skull gets +1 ATK for each side scheme in play.
flavor: "Freedom is only for the one who rules! All others must be slaves!"

name: Red Skull
text: When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
real_text: When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
attack_text: Red Skull gets +1 ATK for each side scheme in play.
flavor: "No one will stand in the way of my plans!"

name: Red Skull
text: When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
real_text: When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
attack_text: Red Skull gets +1 ATK for each side scheme in play.
flavor: "The world will bow to Red Skull!"

name: The Rise of the Red Skull
real_name: The Rise of the Red Skull
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.
real_text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.
flavor: Red Skull plans to conquer the world with the power of the Reality Stone. He uses his strategic genius to keep you busy while he works towards his goal.
back_text:
Contents: Red Skull (I) and Red Skull (II). Red Skull and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Hydra Assault and Hydra Patrol).
Setup: Put the Red House into play. Shuffle every other side scheme into the side-scheme deck and set it next to the encounter deck (see insert).
Set The Sleeper aside, out of play.

name: New World Hydra
text:
[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.
If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.
real_text:
[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.
If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.
back_text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.
back_flavor: The Red Skull is one step closer to unlocking the full power of the Infinity Stone. You need to stop him before he does, and all reality is bent to his evil will.

name: The Sleeper
text:
Guard. Retaliate 1. Toughness.
When Revealed: The Sleeper engages the first player.
When Defeated: Remove The Sleeper from the game.
real_text:
Guard. Retaliate 1. Toughness.
When Revealed: The Sleeper engages the first player.
When Defeated: Remove The Sleeper from the game.

name: Hydra Exo-Soldier
text: Toughness.
real_text: Toughness.
boost_text: Give the villain a tough status card and another boost card.
real_boost_text: Give the villain a tough status card and another boost card.
flavor: "Careful, team. These guys pack a punch!" -- Captain America

name: Red Skull's Luger
text:
Attach to Red Skull.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resource → discard this card.
real_text:
Attach to Red Skull.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resource → discard this card.

real_boost_text: Attach to Red Skull.

name: Red Skull's Right Hook
text:
Attach to Red Skull.
Red Skull gains retaliate 1.

real_text:
Attach to Red Skull.
Red Skull gains retaliate 1.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resources → discard this card.
flavor: "I am your superior in every way!" -- Red Skull

name: Master Strategist
text: Attach to Red Skull.
real_text: Attach to Red Skull.
scheme_text: Forced Interrupt: When Red Skull activates, give him an additional boost card for each side scheme in play. Then, discard this card. (Max once per activation.)
attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Red Skull activates, give him an additional boost card for each side scheme in play. Then, discard this card. (Max once per activation.)
flavor: "In chess, the only piece that truly matters is the King, and that's me." -- Red Skull

name: Twisted Reality
text:
Incite 1.
Attach to a side scheme.
Forced Response: When attached side scheme is defeated, deal the first player an encounter card.
real_text:
Incite 1.
Attach to a side scheme.
Forced Response: When attached side scheme is defeated, deal the first player an encounter card.
flavor: The Infinity Stone gives Red Skull the power to bend reality to his will.

name: Bitter Rival
text: When Revealed: Exhaust a character you control for each side scheme in play.
real_text: When Revealed: Exhaust a character you control for each side scheme in play.
boost_text: Exhaust a character you control.
real_boost_text: Exhaust a character you control.
flavor: "This is the end for you, Herr Captain!" -- Red Skull

name: Spreading Lies
text: When Revealed: Place 2 threat on each scheme in play.
real_text: When Revealed: Place 2 threat on each scheme in play.
boost_text: Give Red Skull a tough status card.
real_boost_text: Give Red Skull a tough status card.
flavor: "With my great and unmatched cunning, Hydra will reign supreme!" -- Red Skull

name: Infinite Power
text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull schemes.
When Revealed (Hero): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull attacks you.
real_text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull schemes.
When Revealed (Hero): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull attacks you.

name: The Red House
text:
Red Skull cannot take damage.
Interrupt: When a character thwarts this side scheme, they may use their ATK instead of their THW.
real_text:
Red Skull cannot take damage.
Interrupt: When a character thwarts this side scheme, they may use their ATK instead of their THW.
flavor: Red Skull built his fortress over the White House as a symbol of Hydra's conquest over America.

name: The Sleeper Awakened
text:
This scheme cannot leave play while The Sleeper is in play.
When Revealed: Put The Sleeper into play engaged with the first player. When The Sleeper is defeated, remove this card from the game.
real_text:
This scheme cannot leave play while The Sleeper is in play.
When Revealed: Put The Sleeper into play engaged with the first player. When The Sleeper is defeated, remove this card from the game.
flavor: Rising from the Potomac River, The Sleeper has awakened to answer Red Skull's summons.

name: Prison Camps
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches their deck and discard pile for an ally, puts it into play, and shuffles their deck.
real_text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches their deck and discard pile for an ally, puts it into play, and shuffles their deck.
flavor: Under Hydra's rule, families are separated and incarcerated without due process.

name: Censor the Past
text: When Defeated: Each player chooses up to 3 cards in their discard pile and shuffles them into their deck.
real_text: When Defeated: Each player chooses up to 3 cards in their discard pile and shuffles them into their deck.
flavor: Hydra controls all media outlets and uses propaganda to turn the masses against the heroes of the past.

name: Hydra Reinforcements
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards a non-Elite minion.
real_text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards a non-Elite minion.
flavor: What Hydra lacks in skill, they make up for with sheer numbers.

name: Mass Chaos
text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck and places 1 threat here for each different type of resource icon ([energy],[mental],[physical], or [wild]) they discarded this way.
real_text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck and places 1 threat here for each different type of resource icon ([energy],[mental],[physical], or [wild]) they discarded this way.
flavor: Red Skull creates catastrophes across the country to keep his enemies busy.

name: Hydra Flame-Soldier
boost_text: If this card resolves during an undefended attack, discard a support you control.
real_boost_text: If this card resolves during an undefended attack, discard a support you control.
attack_text: Forced Response: After Hydra Flame-Soldier makes an undefended attack against you, discard a support you control.

real_text: Quickstrike.

name: Hail Hydra!
text: When Revealed: Each Hydra minion engaged with a hero makes an attack against that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Hydra minion, puts it into play engaged with them, and shuffles the encounter deck.
real_text: When Revealed: Each Hydra minion engaged with a hero makes an attack against that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Hydra minion, puts it into play engaged with them, and shuffles the encounter deck.
